email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Apple ID Lockout Detected - Reset Required

Dear valued Apple customer,

We regret to inform you that our system has detected unusual activity on your Apple ID account. To protect your security and prevent any unauthorized access, we have temporarily locked your account.

To regain access to your account, we kindly ask you to reset your Apple ID password immediately. Please click on the link below to initiate the password reset process:

[Phishing link]

It is crucial that you take action promptly to avoid any further disruption to your account. Failure to reset your password within the next 24 hours may result in a permanent lockout of your Apple ID.

If you did not initiate this request or believe this to be an error, please contact Apple Support immediately for further assistance.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Apple Support Team
